brainly_data.question: Of the intolerable acts, which was going to hurt the Boston Economy the most ?
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.question: Of the intolerable acts, which was going to hurt the Boston Economy the most ?
all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text: The act that would hurt it the most was the Boston Port Act which shut down Boston's Port so they could no longer trade.

top_answer.question: Of the intolerable acts, which was going to hurt the Boston Economy the most ?
top_answer.subject: History
top_answer.text: The act that would hurt it the most was the Boston Port Act which shut down Boston's Port so they could no longer trade.
